channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tesla annual sales decline 9% as it’s overtaken by BYD as global EV leader
item.description: Tesla annual sales have fallen for the second year in a row, a drop fueled by the removal of the federal tax credit in the U.S. and competition from C...

item.description: Over the last two years, Nvidia has used its ballooning fortunes to invest in over 100 AI startups. Here are the giant semiconductor's largest investm...

item.title: India orders Musk’s X to fix Grok over ‘obscene’ AI content
item.description: India's IT ministry has given X 72 hours to submit an action-taken report.

item.title: Pebble reboots its thinnest smartwatch with the Pebble Round 2
item.description: Pebble launches a $199 smartwatch with rounded screen that can last up to 2 weeks on one charge.

item.title: In 2026, AI will move from hype to pragmatism

item.title: Tesla Loses Its EV Crown to BYD as Sales Keep Dropping
item.description: Full-year electric vehicle sales figures have dropped for 2025, revealing China's BYD is now officially global top dog.
